name: Dream Game... Thing...
description:
actually... now looking at this... i dont think i even thought of the theme at all... tsk tsk tsk... 

Yes... This is a shooter game about a boy dreaming that he's in a shooter game...

its also my first minijam submission... <.<

edit: something intrigues me... When I use chrome to play my game the outline effects wont show up... but it seems to work for Firefox... I might need to search up about this...
